yep i'm using it on GB :)

im getting a samsung smart phone and was woundering how you go about getting the apps from PB onto the phone? im not bad at this type of suff i hacked my own xbox 360 and wii along with my psp but this will be my first smart phone

 a link to the fw hack or whatever would be useful

there is no need to hack anything to install these apps on your android, first go to settings>applications and tick the box that says "unknown sources" then just copy the .apk files to your sd card, on you android download a free file manager from the market, locate the .apk file on your sd card, and tap on it to install :)
also if your intrested in modding your samsung, visit forum.xda-developers.com :D
